name: ANNIHILATION (itch)
description:
Thanks for choosing to play Annihilation, an action packed zombie shooting game. Play as Aries, a clone experiment, who gets to mow down hordes of zombies. Try to get to the highest wave you can while progressing your character!
Features
-Multiple upgrades
-Lots of hand crafted weapons
-Unique zombies
-Infinite replayability

If you enjoy Annihilation please be sure to let us know. Like us on Facebook and Twitter at Divided By Zero Laboratories. Don't like Annihilation? No problem, just let us know what we can do to make better games for you. Customers can email us at dividedbyzerolaboratories@gmail.com Thank you again for your purchase!
